long_description: With easy-to-use Quick Clip bike attachment, subtle reflective hits and a water-resistant liner, the Timbuk2 Moraga Bike Pannier offers casual looks that thrive on and off the rack. Quick Clip pannier panel zips away when not in use, and Moraga can be toted by the handles or worn over the shoulder. Adjustable shoulder strap can also be worn crossbody, and the comfortable handles snap together for easy lifting. Water-resistant bottom fabric and coated fabric liner stands up to life on the bike. Elasticized side pockets for your water bottle or small U-lock. Reflective print enhances visibility. The Timbuk2 Moraga Bike Pannier includes a zip-top closure.
short_description: With easy-to-use Quick Clip bike attachment, subtle reflective hits and a water-resistant liner, the Timbuk2 Moraga Bike Pannier offers casual looks that thrive on and off the rack.
